name: Corsair Sea
description:
Corsair Sea is a simple game. Your goal is to survive as long as you can.This may seem easy but when you play you will discover the opposite.

FEATURES:
– The game is swift and fun
– Download and play for free!
– Play offline!(No Internet needed)
- No time limits

HOW TO PLAY Corsair Sea?
Touch the two arrows to change direction of the ship. In order to avoid cannon balls  and eat coins.
